attributes.description: From our co-op farms in Vietnam to our unFlop initiatives in the USA, we pay attention to the steps we take along the way.
attributes.title: The Feelgoodz Journey

attributes.description: The Treehouse is our new design studio and office space in Downtown Raleigh.  It's rad.
attributes.title: The Treehouse

attributes.description: Feelgoodz is a New Orleans-rooted brand.  We call ourselves the Krewe and let the funky jazz guide our brand groove.
attributes.title: Our Roots

attributes.description: We consolidate our flip-flop cartons into 40' containers and ship them to our new DC in La Mirada, CA.  Based just outside Orange County, we work with a company called Paramount Global Services for all of our warehousing and fulfillment.
attributes.title: Distribution Center

attributes.description: We ethically source sustainably harvested 5L natural rubber from three farms in Southern Vietnam.  The rubber is sold at the fair market wage per kilo and is then shipped to our manufacturer for assembly. Pictures coming!
attributes.title: Rubber Farms and Manufacturing
